testcase.classname: to validate login functionality of facebook application
testcase.name: To validate login with valid username and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the chrome browser and maximize the window..................passed When To launch the url of the facebook application..........................passed And To pass valid username in email field..................................passed And To pass valid password in password field...............................passed And To click login button..................................................passed And To check whether navigate to the homepage or not........................passed Then To close the browser...................................................passed

testcase.classname: to validate login functionality of facebook application
testcase.name: To validate positive and negative combination of login functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the chrome browser and maximize the window..................passed When User has to launch the url of facebook application.....................passed And User has to pass username "abc11@gamil.com"in email field...............passed And User has to pass password "abc11"in password field......................passed And User has to click login button..........................................passed And User has to check whether navigate to the homepage or not...............passed Then User has to close the browser..........................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given To launch the chrome browser and maximize the window..................passed When User has to launch the url of facebook application.....................passed And User has to pass username "banu12@gmail.com"in email field..............passed And User has to pass password "banu"in password field.......................passed And User has to click login button..........................................passed And User has to check whether navigate to the homepage or not...............passed Then User has to close the browser..........................................passed
